name: 武儒绘卷 - 启示录
description:
"Wu Confucian Painting Volume-Apocalypse" is a three-country background development game. Players can formulate their own development routes in the game, or assist the emperor as a counselor, or assist the emperor to seek the Quartet as a military commander, and he can be the monarch himself


Game Features

  • Manipulate an ancient character, choose your growth line and develop it
  • Many playable spurs, you can go to the pub to drink, to perform the dart mission, etc
  • There are many achievements can get
